attributes.additional_details:
Establishing an independent body to oversee investigations and prosecutions, ensuring impartiality and accountability.
Implementing mandatory reporting for professionals who suspect abuse, strengthening the safety net for vulnerable children.
Investing in prevention programs and education to challenge harmful attitudes and empower young people to protect themselves.
attributes.background: While numerous reports and investigations have shed light on this issue, a compelling argument exists for holding a public referendum to address it further.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
